name: ThreadMirror
tagline: Mirror any X (Twitter) thread on pdp with a single mention — permanent, searchable, and shareable.
description: ThreadMirror lets you archive any X (Twitter) thread with a single mention. Reply @threadmirror under the thread—you'll receive a permanent link, an AI-generated summary, and a long shareable image, all stored immutably on Filecoin PDP.
